name: Mr Sweet
content: Mr Sweet is a student at a programming bootcamp. He is very considerate. One day, one of his classmates went out to pack lunch. On her way back, it suddenly rained dogs and cats. Mr Sweet immediately called her to ask where she was, and brought one umbrella to fetch her. Even there are 2 umbrellas in the room and he knew he needed 2 umbrellas, he decided to only bring 1, just in case someone else need the other umbrella. So he was all drenched when he came back.
